raw_comment:
I notice that the leaves in the southern states or states in the southeast and southwest have their leaves bloom early compared to the northern regions. I wonder why this is the case?

Maybe its because the southern states are closer to the equator which allows more sun exposure. This speeds up the growth and allows leaves to bloom earlier and faster.
ace_sentences: I notice that leaves in southern states bloom early.
I notice that leaves in southeastern states bloom early.
I notice that leaves in southwestern states bloom early.
Leaves in northern regions bloom later than leaves in southern states.
I wonder why this is the case.
Southern states are closer to the equator than northern regions.
If a state is closer to the equator then the state has more sun exposure.
More sun exposure speeds up plant growth.
If plant growth is faster then leaves bloom earlier.
If plant growth is faster then leaves bloom faster.
